TEST.TIMEOUT_DOC:
Timeout in seconds until Peppymeter screensaver starts.

Please set follow options in Touch Display plugin:
- The standard screensaver timeout in TouchScreen plugin should be set higher as than for PeppyMeter
-
- 'No Screensaver while playing' to 'ON'
TEST.PEPPYMETER_DESC: The most important parameters of PeppyMeter.
TEST.METER_DOC: All VU-Meters of active meter folder, (only worked if enabled 'No screensaver while playing')
TEST.LIST_EMPTY: No VU-Meters in list. Revert back to random mode!
TEST.RANDOMSELECTION_DOC:
Comma separated list of meter names for using, if 'List' selected.
Available meter list for copy and paste:
TEST.RANDOMINTERVAL_DOC: Time interval until the next meter is displayed
TEST.NEEDLE_CACHE_DOC: A Raspberry with 1GB RAM and a display resolution of 1920x1080 or 1280x800 is hard at the memory limit. Therefore the cache has to be switched off, in order to save memory. Otherwise, no random or list mode is possible
TEST.SCREEN_WIDTH_DOC: The specification of the screen resolution is only necessary for the use of a 'custom folder' with background image
TEST.SCREEN_HEIGHT_DOC: The specification of the screen resolution is only necessary for the use of a 'custom folder' with background image
TEST.ACTIVE_FOLDER_DOC: Selection of the actively used folder for VU-Meter (in addition the specification of screen resolution is necessary for the 'Custom-Folder' with background image)
TEST.INFO_MIN: The value has been adjusted to the lowest possible because the value entered is too small.
TEST.INFO_MAX: The value has been adjusted to the highest possible because the value entered is too big.
TEST.NAN: : La valeur précédente a été conservée car la valeur saisie n'est pas un nombre.
TEST.NO_PEPPYCONFIG: No PeppyMeter 'config.txt' found. Cannot read and save settings!
TEST.UNINSTALL_MSG: Please restart the system, when unistallation is complete
